caption: Cafe near Notre Dame. Interior and exterior are good. We ordered onion soup and the dish of the day - it was ribs with potatoes. The waiter was very polite, the service was pleasant. The food is delicious. I recommend the traditional soup üëåüèª The portions are large.

Nice little place a stones throw away from Notre-Dame. Really warm welcome from the front of house team, bilingual as well. Food came really quickly and was good portion size. Would recommend for food or a drink on a warm day sat out in front.

The food was great and not too expensive, in comparison to other places in Paris.  The service was very good. The waiter was pleasant and patient with us, tourists, who weren't completely sure as to what we should order.  As for the atmosphere, the inner part of the restaurant gives a sense of an upper class place, since it's decorated with classic chairs and tables.  All in all, it's a great and recommended place!  P.S. A huge apology to the restaurant for accidentally breaking a jar next to where we sat.

After a busy work trip we had only two hours to enjoy Paris so time was tight and we wanted to see the Notre Dame and then find a lovely Parisienne cafe to enjoy the atmosphere. We walked around and nothing hit the spot until we found Le Parvis. It was perfect! We had a lovely seat outside this cute little bistro to people watch and enjoy a bottle of wine and a delicious cheeseboard. Our waiter was really friendly, didn't treat us like tourists which we had fully expected and made us feel super welcome which really added to our experience and we had a fabulous time. Thank you Le Parvis for a short but very sweet French welcome break in your lovely cafe.
The food is amazing!! One of the best restaurants near to Notre Dame, I can‚Äôt describe the happiness in every bite! If I visit Paris in the future I will eat here again a and again ‚ù§Ô∏è
Came here for a cup of tea and crepes. Everything was great!
We had a wonderful meal here. The food was delicious and the service was great. They were very patient with my inadequate French, and spoke English to us.

Quite honestly, I was expecting a tourist trap. But stopped in as I was tired and starving.  Really excellent food. A bit pricey, being on the river, but worth it.  The onion soup and savory crepes are lovely.  Cheap wine is always a plus.  Super fast for the visitor on the go!
Good place for a lunch around Notre Dames. The food is simple but is perfect for a quick lunch.

Exactly the kind of place we were looking for in Paris! Located near the Nortre Dame, the place has a nice atmosphere, very nice service, and menu options are varied. Grest traditional dishes. Our best recommendations.
Good food, easy to order.  I had the ham and eggs for breakfast. They also had amazing dessert. Staff was humorous and very polite when we attempted to speak French and failed miserably.
You love traditional French food? Then this is your place. Service is lovely, food delicious and there is lots of street activity to watch from their terrasse

Omelette was good but not amazing. The cafe creme was the best. Very good lite dessert. Nice Parisian cafe atmosphere. Can sit inside or outside. They will push tables together for you for larger groups.

This place was great!!  Had a savory crepe and the ribs, both of which were awesome. It was reasonable priced (I think 22‚Ç¨ for ribs and 12‚Ç¨ for cr√™pe) for a touristy area of Paris. Service was also great - refilled our water bottles for us and had no problem giving us coffees to go. Would definitely recommend!!
Hidden gem near Seine very close to St. Chappelle. Excellent quick service and the food was outstanding!   Highly recommend!!
Great stop on a rainy day next to Notre Dame. French onion soup and Quiche Lorraine both were excellent.
Stopped for breakfast. Very good and quick service. Tasty food and great value for money, especially considering the touristy area.
Quite little place! Customer service was amazing and everything we ate was FANTASTIC! Beef bourguignon, Notre Dame crepe, Quiche Loraine.
This was soooo good and great service. Faster service than normal. Although i dont have much choices of another side since they usually just have fries but this was juicy and the gravy was soo good.
We were just walking to Notre Dame and came across this wonderful restaurant.

We stopped after a morning of site seeing to have some food at this cafe and it was good enough. I'm easy to please so that's not saying too much. The food tasted good, the waiter was very friendly but treated us like tourists (even though we speak fluent French). I mean if you have to eat and you're in the area, it was food.
Excellent food and great service - highly recommend eating here.
Lovely little hangout with an excellent cheese and prosciutto plate and with some pate. And great service!

For a touristy area, we were so so happy to find this jewel. Being French I come to Paris a lot and finding great service is not super common. The owners and staff are incredibly sweet, service minded and smile! And the food, traditional French cafe/bistrot was delicious. Will come back!
Lovely meals and service was great.

The maitre'd was off the chain nice and helpful. It felt like everyone was a regular even though this was clearly a high tourist location.  Food was simple but came out very quick and was very good; meat at exact temperature,  well seasoned; it's a well thought out menu.
Food was tasty and service was good

Very good place, waiter is very kind, helpful and professional. He tries to make your stay very comfortable, giving advice about what to see in Paris. He knows English very well which is not always in other restaurants a rule. The food was very good. Next time when we visit the place we will order snails and frog legs!
A pleasant little streetside Cafe! Laid back, not too noisy...
Very nice place, very attentive and welcoming staff. Would recommend if you are in the area.

Wandered by and was interested in having Boeuf bourrguignon while in France.  This was the first restaurant we found (after looking for over 3 years and 5 trips.)  The atmosphere is wonderful in this small restaurant.  The wait staff was super friendly and made the stop a lot of fun.  The food was fabulous.  We enjoyed some Chocolate chaud, French onion soup as well as the mushroom and herb omellette.  Everything was really good.

Good steak and creme brulee, but most importantly, the service is great. The staff speak English and are used to tourists. It's also a good place to hang out and people watch near Notre Dame.  I would gladly come back.

A perfect French food experience in Paris. The staff is charming, friendly, funny and polite. The food is really nice and the snails are the best in Paris. We've been around to the other restaurants but we've found this one to be the best. It's not only about the food it's also about the service and this place exceeds your expectation with the service and friendliness of the staff which makes it a great experience. We've came back there over and over again even if was for a glass of wine and some snails to just relax and enjoy the ambiance.
Loved it we will be returning next year can't wait to see the boys and have some fun and great food
Confirming, fast and friendly service!  Food is very good.   I ordered the spaghetti bolegnaise, the other dish was fish. - very tasty.  Definitely not a tourist trap
The server was excellent! He's very nice and loves to interact with the guests. The Crepes and drinks were delicious. They played reggaeton music and it felt like we were back in Miami lol

The food is nice, tasty, but especially the service was very good! The young waiter who served us was very kind. I was afraid to come here because of the awful comments about the service but I was very surprised with the great service and kindness of the waiter who served us this sunday, a tall young man. The other older one was also very nice. Perhaps they changed staff since those comments? Anyways, I thought it would be fair to recommend this place to passing tourists as it does not deserve such a bad punctuation.

We had excellent Quiche Lorraine and a glass of white wine for dinner, after our visit to Notre dame cathedral which is literally around the corner. The staff was friendly and prices were reasonable. For me that is 5 stars!
